|tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=002687XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^002687[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:26:87 |oui_eth=00:26:87 }} [http://corega.jp/prod/wlr300gnz/ Product page] :'''JAN''': 4519157021111, release date 2012-11-16, standard price: 6,615 JPY (6,300 JPY before tax)
[http://d.hatena.ne.jp/halfrack/20130105/1357415329 On ''mura日記 (halfrack)'''s blog] (large amount of excellent images, boot log, etc) :"2976406002" is silkscreened on the board. :The device is using... :*<small>everything else noted in this page</small> :*'''Chemi-Con''' <small>('''KZE''')</small> radial capacitors :00:26:87 ('''Allied Telesis''' - '''corega''' division) OUI, '''002687XXXXXX''' default SSID format :The power adapter included with the device is a '''corega'''-branded ('''Leader Electronics'''?) MU12-S120100-A1 (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 26-37VA, 0.5A -> 12VDC, 1.0A).
